layout.singingstanza: Go, Je -- sus! Go, Je -- sus, go! Trav -- el a cir -- cuit; You love man so! Through the grain fields to a town; Up to the moun -- tains, and then down! Vis -- it a vil -- lage, walk by the sea. Eat in a house with peo -- ple like me! All a -- round the coun -- try -- side, You're serv -- ing peo -- ple far and wide!

lyrics.stanza: Go, Jesus! Go, Jesus, go! Travel a circuit; You love man so! Through the grain fields to a town; Up to the mountains, and then down! Visit a village, walk by the sea. Eat in a house with people like me! All around the countryside, You're serving people far and wide!
